channel.description: Recent content in knowledge work on Vincent's Blog

item.title: "Doing Knowledge Work" part 1: Introduction to the Series
item.description: Introduction I set up a blog because I enjoy tinkering with one. But now that I have one, what do I put on it? What is it that I’m not only willing to share with the world, but that at least some people might find interesting and useful? For a long while I thought about this. Then it dawned on me. It’s obvious: what I’m going to write about is personal productivity.
